pageProps.title: What advantage does Object.defineProperties() offer over multiple calls to Object.defineProperty()?
pageProps.description: Master JavaScript's powerful property descriptor system. Learn how to control object property behavior with flags like writable, enumerable, and configurable. Understand advanced techniques for defining getters/setters, creating non-enumerable properties, sealing objects, and leveraging Object.defineProperty() for fine-grained control over your JavaScript objects.
